title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A fresh perspective on your beliefs proves motivational. At first, it might be jarring to have your basic assumptions questioned or even challenged. But resist the impulse to be defensive or argue your case. Change the rules of the game by going beyond right or wrong. Instead, see how a contrary opinion illuminates and releases the potency of your own views. You dont need to spend energy on changing anyones principles when youre plugged into the truth. Aligning with your own core values allows you to achieve your goals smoothly. There's no reason to fight when you know you are right. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
